io.github.robolib.output

Class PWMController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.robolib.iface.Interface
      • io.github.robolib.iface.PWM
        • io.github.robolib.output.PWMController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sendable, LiveWindowSendable, MotorSafety, SpeedController, PIDOutput
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Jaguar, Talon, TalonSRX, Victor, VictorSP

    public abstract class PWMController
extends PWM
implements SpeedController, MotorSafety
    Author:
    Austin Reuland

    • Constructor Detail

      • PWMController

        public PWMController(PWM.PWMChannel channel)
        Instantiates a new PWM motor controller.
        Parameters:
        channel - the pwm channel this controller operates on

      • PWMController

        public PWMController(PWM.PWMChannel channel,
                     java.lang.String desc)
        Instantiates a new PWM motor controller. Giving a description helps with debugging. It will be used in log outputs.
        Parameters:
        channel - the pwm channel this controller operates on
        desc - the description of this motor controller

      • PWMController

        public PWMController(PWM.PWMChannel channel,
                     java.lang.String desc,
                     PDP.PowerChannel pwChannel)
        Instantiates a new PWM motor controller. Giving a description helps with debugging. It will be used in log outputs. Giving a power channel will help with power logging. It will be shown as this controllers power channel on power log outputs.
        Parameters:
        channel - the pwm channel this controller operates on
        desc - the description of this motor controller
        pwChannel - The PDP(Power Distribution Panel) Channel

      • PWMController

        public PWMController(PWM.PWMChannel channel,
                     java.lang.String desc,
                     PDP.PowerChannel pwChannel,
                     double boundsPosMax,
                     double boundsPosMin,
                     double boundsCenter,
                     double boundsNegMax,
                     double boundsNegMin,
                     PWM.PeriodMultiplier multi)
        Instantiates a new PWM motor controller. Giving a description helps with debugging. It will be used in log outputs. Giving a power channel will help with power logging. It will be shown as this controllers power channel on power log outputs.
        Parameters:
        channel - the pwm channel this controller operates on
        desc - the description of this motor controller
        pwChannel - The PDP(Power Distribution Panel) Channel
        boundsPosMax - The maximum PWM pulse in ms
        boundsPosMin - The maximum of the pulse deadband in ms
        boundsCenter - The center/zero/off pulse width in ms
        boundsNegMax - the mimium of the pulse deadband in ms
        boundsNegMin - The minimum PWM pulse in ms
        multi - The PeriodMultiplier enum

        Returns:

      • set

        public void set(double speed,
                byte syncGroup)
        Common interface for setting the speed of a speed controller.
        Specified by:
        set in interface SpeedController
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed to set. Value should be between -1.0 and 1.0.
        syncGroup - The update group to add this Set() to, pending UpdateSyncGroup(). If 0, update immediately.
